step2Text: Tap the Explore tab to learn more about what's included in this starter app.
step3Text: When you're ready, run npm run reset-project to get a fresh app directory.
kycPlaceholder: This page will be updated later.
kycDescription: Complete your identity verification to access all features
kycStartMessage: Ready to start your identity verification
kycInProgress: Verification in progress. Complete the process in the opened window.
kycPendingVerification: Email {email} is waiting for approval. Click here to start a new verification.
kycPendingMessage: Your verification is being processed. You will be notified once it is complete.
emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
emailHelp: Your email will be used to send you verification results and for account recovery purposes.
processingDescription: Please wait while we verify your identity. This may take a moment.
resultDescription: Thank you for completing the verification process.
invalidEmailMessage: Please enter a valid email address.
cancelVerificationMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel the verification process?
cameraPermissionMessage: We need camera access for verification
mediaPermissionMessage: We need access to your photos for verification
storagePermissionMessage: We need access to your storage for verification
permissionsRequiredMessage: Camera and storage permissions are required for identity verification.
